zone.description: The id of the device's zone.

settingsObj.description: This property is true when there are settings, getable by the getDeviceSettingsObj method

quickAction.description: Optional capabilityId of the quick action

ready.description: A device is when the device's driver is available and ready.

available.description: A device can be available or unavailable, decided by the device's driver. If the driver is unavailable, the property `unavailableMessage` might be set. For example, a device can be unavailable when there is no wireless connection possible.

repair.description: If true, this device can be repaired using a repair PairSession.

unpair.description: If true, this device needs to be deleted using an unpair PairSession.

zone.description: The id of the device's zone.

settingsObj.description: This property is true when there are settings, getable by the getDeviceSettingsObj method

quickAction.description: Optional capabilityId of the quick action

ready.description: A device is when the device's driver is available and ready.

available.description: A device can be available or unavailable, decided by the device's driver. If the driver is unavailable, the property `unavailableMessage` might be set. For example, a device can be unavailable when there is no wireless connection possible.

repair.description: If true, this device can be repaired using a repair PairSession.

unpair.description: If true, this device needs to be deleted using an unpair PairSession.

value.description: Should be the same type as defined in the `type` property.

intersectedScopes.description: These are the actual available scopes. This is an intersection between the requested scopes and the user's scopes.
